original_text: So God's servant went back with him and he ate and drank in his house.
korean_text: 이에 그 사람이 그와 함께 돌아가서 그의 집에서 떡을 먹으며 물을 마시니라

sentences.original_text: So God's servant went back with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님의 종은 그와 함께 돌아갔고

sentences.original_text: and he ate and drank in his house
